TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LocalFileSettingsProvider extends System.Configuration.SettingsProvider implements class System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider
Public Class LocalFileSettingsProvider Inherits SettingsProvider Implements IApplicationSettingsProvider
type LocalFileSettingsProvider = class inherit SettingsProvider interface IApplicationSettingsProvider

summary.span: 提供應用程式設定類別的持續性 (Persistence)。

span.span: Provides persistence for application settings classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定提供者會定義儲存在應用程式設定架構中使用的設定資料的機制。Setting providers define a mechanism for storing configuration data used in the application settings architecture. [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]包含單一的預設設定的提供者， ，它會儲存到本機檔案系統的組態資料。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] contains a single default settings provider, , which stores configuration data to the local file system. 應用程式設定屬性群組會關聯至特定的設定提供者使用。An application settings property or group of properties are associated to a specific settings provider through the use of the . 一般而言，用戶端程式不會明確地存取此類別中;相反地，應用程式設定架構會自動叫用適當的設定提供者需要其服務時。Typically, the client program does not explicitly access this class; rather, the application settings architecture automatically invokes the appropriate settings provider when its services are required. 比方說，有許多的成員它們的工作委派給相關聯的設定提供者。For example, many of the members of delegate their work to the associated settings provider. 保存至延伸模組的組態檔設定`.config`。 persists settings to configuration files that have the extension `.config`. 組態檔的內容為 XML 文件結構。The contents of configuration files are structured as XML documents. 取決於是否設定的範圍是在應用程式層級或使用者層級，設定資料會儲存為項目內``或``分別區段群組。Depending on whether the setting is scoped at either the application-level or user-level, the configuration data is stored as elements within an `` or a `` section group, respectively. 每個區段群組由相對應或分別。Each of these section groups is represented by a corresponding or , respectively. 一節中的每個物件所擁有及管理組態區段處理常式，這是一個物件的型別。Each section object is owned and administered by a configuration section handler, which is an object of type . 應用程式範圍的設定和預設使用者範圍的設定會儲存在名為`application.exe.config`，這會建立可執行檔相同的目錄中。Application-scoped settings and the default user-scoped settings are stored in a file named `application.exe.config`, which is created in the same directory as the executable file. 應用程式組態設定是唯讀的。Application configuration settings are read-only. 特定的使用者資料會儲存在名為`user.config`儲存使用者的主目錄下。Specific user data is stored in a file named `user.config`, stored under the user's home directory. 如果啟用漫遊設定檔，可能存在的使用者設定檔的兩個版本。If roaming profiles are enabled, two versions of the user configuration file could exist. 在此情況下，漫遊的版本中的項目優先於本機使用者組態檔中的重複項目。In such a case, the entries in the roaming version take precedence over duplicated entries in the local user configuration file. 如需有關應用程式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[適用於 Windows Form 應用程式設定](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。For more information about application settings, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md).

span.span: Application Settings Architecture

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性協助釐清同樣地在不同的應用程式中的具名的設定屬性。The and properties help to disambiguate similarly named setting properties in different applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用於搭配新版應用程式在安裝期間移轉應用程式設定時的方法。The method is often used in conjunction with the method when migrating application settings during the installation of a new version of an application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法也會管理特殊應用程式設定類型。The method also manages the special application settings type . 連接字串會儲存在組態檔項目所分隔的特殊區段``。Connection strings are stored in a special section of the configuration file delimited by the element ``. > [!CAUTION] > 不使用加密來保存任何設定。 does not use encryption to persist any settings. 因此，請勿儲存純文字密碼或其他機密資訊，使用此提供者，而不需要採取其他預防措施，例如分別加密組態檔中的資訊。Therefore, do not store plain text passwords or other sensitive information using this provider without taking additional precautions, such as separately encrypting the information within the configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 組態加密組態資訊使用受保護的](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1).

summary.span: 將與指定應用程式相關聯的所有應用程式設定屬性重設為其預設值。

span.span: Resets all application settings properties associated with the specified application to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法還原指定的應用程式設定群組中的預存的值。The method restores the stored values of the specified application settings group. 動作的取決於應用程式設定屬性的範圍：The action of depends on the scope of the application settings property: - 不會影響應用程式範圍的設定。Application-scoped settings are not affected. - 使用者範圍的設定會重設為預設值儲存為應用程式組態檔中的唯讀項目`application.exe.config`。User-scoped settings are reset to the default values that are stored as read-only entries in the application configuration file, `application.exe.config`. 如果使用漫遊設定檔，在漫遊設定檔中的任何應用程式設定值優先於在本機設定檔中找到的重複項目。If roaming profiles are being used, any application settings values in the roaming profile take precedence over duplicates found in the local profile. 請注意，是否使用漫遊設定檔，可能會有兩個`user.config`檔案，一個用於本機設定，一個的漫遊設定檔。Notice that if roaming profiles are used, there can be two `user.config` files, one for the local settings and one for the roaming profile.

exception.span: 遇到了使用者範圍的設定，但是目前的組態僅支援應用程式範圍的設定。

span.span: A user-scoped setting was encountered but the current configuration only supports application-scoped settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定包裝函式類別，衍生自，包含方法，呼叫以保存所有其設定屬性的值。A settings wrapper class, derived from , contains the method, which is called to persist the values of all of its settings properties. 這個方法會列舉所有設定其設定屬性與呼叫相關聯的提供者方法，每個執行實際的序列化作業。This method enumerates through all the settings providers associated with its settings properties, and calls the method for each to perform the actual serialization operation. 個別將序列化其對應的應用程式中適當設定每個使用者範圍的應用程式設定屬性`user.config`組態檔。 individually serializes each user-scoped application settings property to its corresponding application setting in the appropriate `user.config` configuration file. 根據預設，方法會使用下列的邏輯順序來決定序列化配置，視設定屬性的類型而定：By default, the method uses the following logical sequence to determine the serialization scheme, depending on type of the settings property: 1. 如果類型具有相關聯與方法實作，這項轉換會使用。If the type has an associated with a method implementation, this conversion is used. 2. 會使用 XML 序列化。XML serialization is used. 不過，您可以指定慣用的序列化機制，利用。However, you can specify a preferred serialization mechanism by using the . 不支援二進位序列化[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。 does not support binary serialization in [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 如果使用者範圍的設定屬性設回其預設值明確，本機檔案的設定提供者會從使用者設定檔移除的項目相關聯的設定。If a user-scoped settings property is set back to its default value explicitly, then the local file settings provider will remove the entry for the associated setting from the user configuration file. 下一步 「 讀取 」 權限，此屬性只會使用預設值。The next read access for this property will simply use the default value. > [!CAUTION] > 不使用加密來保存任何設定。 does not use encryption to persist any settings. 因此，請勿儲存純文字密碼或其他機密資訊，使用此提供者，而不需要採取其他預防措施，例如分別加密組態檔中的資訊。Therefore, do not store plain text passwords or other sensitive information using this provider without taking additional precautions, such as separately encrypting the information within the configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 組態加密組態資訊使用受保護的](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1).

summary.span: 嘗試從舊版的同一應用程式中移轉先前的使用者範圍中的設定。

span.span: Attempts to migrate previous user-scoped settings from a previous version of the same application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將移轉中個別作業的本機和漫遊設定。 migrates the local and roaming settings in separate operations. 方法會隱藏設定，每個應用程式有套用至它，或整個設定包裝函式類別，衍生自。The method is suppressed for every application setting that has the applied to it, or to the entire settings wrapper class, derived from . 如此一來，會呼叫這個方法會取決於正在升級的應用程式類型：This way this method is called depends on the type of application that is being upgraded: - 每個版本的[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]自己獨立的安裝目錄中儲存應用程式。Each version of a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is stored in its own isolated installation directory. 之後的新版本[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]已安裝應用程式，並先執行新的版本時，會自動呼叫內部邏輯移轉至新版本的所有常見的應用程式設定。After a new version of a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is installed, and when the new version is first run, internal logic will automatically call to migrate all common application settings to the new version. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ClickOnce 和應用程式設定](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/891caba6-faef-4a3c-8f71-60e6fadb60eb)。For more information, see [ClickOnce and Application Settings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/891caba6-faef-4a3c-8f71-60e6fadb60eb). - 標準的 Windows Forms 和主控台應用程式必須以手動方式呼叫，因為不是一個一般、 自動的方式，來判斷這類應用程式第一次執行時。Standard Windows Forms and console applications must manually call , because there is not a general, automatic way to determine when such an application is first run. 兩個常見方法是從安裝程式，或使用來自應用程式本身使用保存的屬性，通常名為類似`IsFirstRun`。The two common ways to do this are either from the installation program or using from the application itself, using a persisted property, often named something like `IsFirstRun`. 請注意，若要移轉的應用程式設定為較新版本，它必須能夠也載入，並讀取較舊版本的應用程式設定。Note that for the newer version to migrate application settings, it must be able to also load and read the older version of the application settings. 因此，它必須包含與應用程式的新的和先前版本相容的包裝函式類別。Therefore, it must contain wrapper classes compatible with both the new and previous versions of the application.

span.span: The previous version of the configuration file could not be accessed.
